content.p: To assist NEW international students upon their arrival at UNM, please fill in the online Arrival Information Form with all the required information including your flight details. The form is available from the 1st August. Airport pickup will only be available from Terminal 1 on the following dates. If you arrive at Terminal 2, please make your own arrangements to get to Terminal 1 to take up the free airport pickup: Pick-up Dates: 19th August 2024,Monday to 20th September 2024,Friday(Including weekends) * Airport pick up will not be available during the public holidays - 31st August 2024 and 16th Sept 2024 Pick-up timing: 10.00AM, 4.00PM & 9.00PM Accommodation If you are living on-campus, you are advised to email and inform the Accommodation Office about your arrival ( this is very important if you are arriving on weekends, after hours or during public holiday) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
